page.title: 15HOME FARM
page.content: Commonly referred to as Sezincote Estate.It covers 3000 acres.The manager for 37 years has been Mr. Lamb.Ther are 16 employees including 2 Y.T.S.,gardeners,household staff,foresters & 2 gamekeepers.Most workers are housed in cottages on the estate.The estate has its own social club.Machinery includes 10 tractors plus implements,2 balers,1 combine harvester & a silage maker.A full time mechanic services the machinery.400 acres of cereals are grown divided into 75 of wheat, 60 of oats & the remainder barley.Very few chemicals are used on the farm.There are 700 beef cattle on the farm & 200 are sold each year.Woodland occupies a large area & the farm is self sufficient for its timber needs.Manor Farm nearby is also owned by Mrs.S.Peake & is run on identical lines.
